title: An exhortation vnto prayer thought mete by the kinges maiestie, and his clergy, to be read to the people in euery church afore processyions. Also a letanie with suffrages to be said or song in the tyme of the said processyons.
author: Church of England.
publicationDate: the XXVII. day of May, the yere of our Lorde. M. D. XLIIII. 1544]
publisher: In Fletestrete, by Thomas Berthelet printer to the kinges highnes,
notes: The litany and suffrages printed in red and black.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
